name: Blood Path
description:
Bloodpath is a simple and fun platformer game, meant to take your mind off of our daily burdens and jump around for no reason. 

SPACE = Jump / Build

SHIFT = Run

MOUSE = Rotate Camera

Jumping while in Air will allow you to build a platform/block in an empty space below you, but it will reduce your health by 1. Health is only used for building, so don't be worried about dying from health. Replenish it by picking up health bonuses that spawn around. Try to avoid the masterfully designed ducks :) 

Game will progressively get harder. Try and get as far as you can!

Have fun and thanks for playing!
